Landing

The landing template provides additional grouping of content beyond the section homepage.

Available in: Squiz Matrix

Example (Education theme)

View template

Usage

  • The landing template should be used directly under the section homepage.
  • The template shows the content group’s title, a brief description, and a list of child pages in this group.
  • Do not use this template if there are fewer than two child pages. Use the standard content page instead.
  • Use the main content area to add context to this content group.
  • Do not repeat duplicate links to child pages from within the main content area.
  • If the main content area contains more than three paragraphs, use a standard content page instead.

How-to guides

Learn how to use the landing template in:

  • Squiz Matrix
